
``` {r load packages}
library(data.table)
```

```{r load data} 
loadFName = 'Make 18 - Pilot V2.csv'

rawData <- data.table::fread(input = loadFName)
```


``` {r clean data}
repeatedIPs = data.table(table(rawData[, IPAddress]))[N>1, V1]

cleanedData = rawData[-(1:2), ] # remove all data from headings (i.e. first two rows)
cleanedData = cleanedData[!(IPAddress %in% repeatedIPs), ] # remove all data from IP addresses that appear more than once
cleanedData = cleanedData[Status != 'Survey Preview', ] # remove all data from "Survey Preview" records
cleanedData = cleanedData[(LocationLatitude > 38 | LocationLatitude < 37), ] # remove all data from 37 < LocalLatitude < 38 (i.e. Bay Area)
```

``` {r EDA}
ate = mean(as.numeric(cleanedData[Random == 2, final_score])) - mean(as.numeric(cleanedData[Random == 1, final_score]))
std = sd(as.numeric(cleanedData[ , final_score]))

sprintf('ATE: %f', ate)
sprintf('std: %f', std)

```
